amendment.description: To revise the interagency oceans and human health research program provisions of the reported bill.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2933 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2933 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Hollings. (consideration: CR S3115) To revise the interagency oceans and human health research program provisions of the reported bill.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2933 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2933 proposed by Senator Frist for Senator Hollings.
